response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is tailored to meet your needs and expectations. Given its high quality and unique features, I believe it's worth more than its face value of $150 to you. Considering its exceptional value, I'm offering it to you for $200. This price reflects not only the cost of production but also the exclusive benefits and the opportunity to own something truly special. I'm confident you'll find this investment worthwhile. Let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.", "product_price": 200}
